main event: Air Traffic Controllers observed a pulsating white light moving rapidly over Pope AFB.
interesting points: The object was described as pulsating and the size of a half-dollar., The object moved faster than any aircraft the witnesses had seen., The sighting lasted only 3 to 4 seconds., The visibility conditions were clear with 3 to 5 miles of visibility., The investigating officer found no physical evidence to explain the sighting.
witness description: Air Traffic Controllers from Wright-Patterson AFB
